title: Yin Yoga Restoration
notes: Wednesday parasympathetic reset. Hold each pose 2-4 minutes unless noted. Time audit: 39.0 min total / 0.0 min working (all recovery).

items.name: Cat-Cow to Cobra Stretch
items.notes: Move with breath to lubricate spine before settling into long holds.

items.name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
items.notes: Hold 150s forward fold then 60s upright rotation per side; use props to keep knees supported.

items.name: Pigeon Pose
items.notes: Hold 120s per side; fold over front shin and use a bolster under hip if knee talks back.

items.name: Sphinx Pose
items.notes: Let ribs melt toward floor while forearms press lightly; backbends stay gentle.

items.name: Caterpillar Pose (Seated Forward Fold - Yin Style)
items.notes: Allow spine to round; focus on long exhales (4-6s).

items.name: Child's Pose
items.notes: Walk hands to each side for 60s to bias lats, then return center.

items.name: Supine Spinal Twist
items.notes: Hold 120s per side; extend top leg if it feels good, otherwise keep knees bent.

items.name: Legs Up the Wall
items.notes: Prop hips on folded blanket if hamstrings need slack; relax arms palms-up.

items.name: Deep Breathing
items.notes: Box breathing 4-4-6-2 while supine to finishâ€”stay until breath rate slows naturally.
